abstract: De mortuis nihil nisi bonum. Don't rip the dead. It seems to be the generous sentiment behind most of the coverage following the deaths of two Bay Area titans in the last week, Steve Jobs and Al Davis.
snippet: De mortuis nihil nisi bonum. Don't rip the dead. It seems to be the generous sentiment behind most of the coverage following the deaths of two Bay Area titans in the last week, Steve Jobs and Al Davis.
